channel.title: Configure Baobab Network on Klaytn CCO Onboarding - Baobab
channel.description: Recent content in Configure Baobab Network on Klaytn CCO Onboarding - Baobab

item.title: Prepare genesis.json for Baobab network
item.description: 1. Remove or backup existing genesis.json for Pre-cypress. 1) For CN, $ mv <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data/genesis.json <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data/genesis.json.pre-cypress 2) For PN, $ mv <your_klaytn_home_path>/kpnd/data/genesis.json <your_klaytn_home_path>/kpnd/data/genesis.json.pre-cypress 2. Download the genesis.json for Baobab network. 1) For CN, $ curl -X GET https://packages.klaytn.net/baobab/genesis.json -o <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data/genesis.json 2) For PN, $ curl -X GET https://packages.klaytn.net/baobab/genesis.json -o <your_klaytn_home_path>/kpnd/data/genesis.json 3. Check the network_id in the genesis.json downloaded. 1) For CN, $ grep "chainId" <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data/genesis.json "chainId": 1001, 2) For PN, $ grep "chainId" <your_klaytn_home_path>/kpnd/data/genesis.

item.title: Node Configuration
item.description: 1. Modify network, discovery and boot node information. ** Note that CN and PN have some different information. 1) For CN, $ egrep "^NETWORK|NO_DISCOVER|BOOTNODES" /etc/kcnd/conf/kcnd.conf NETWORK="baobab" NETWORK_ID= NO_DISCOVER=0 # setting 1 to disable discovery BOOTNODES="kni://8e1881cdca97f52a76c6d2683db030f51a34ffc039476b4ed5bc5c757de1b5ce48fea1e53aa182a6ac2b076460881d50d3b57461d1cf36fae777e992893ad485@52.199.8.244:32323?discport=32323&ntype=bn" 2) For PN, $ egrep "^NETWORK|NO_DISCOVER|BOOTNODES" /etc/kpnd/conf/kpnd.conf NETWORK="baobab" NETWORK_ID= NO_DISCOVER=1 # setting 1 to disable discovery BOOTNODES="" 2. Check if the static-nodes.json is correct for your PN. ** Unlike CN, PN uses a static-nodes.json file to find out where to connect.

item.title: Node Initialization
item.description: 1. Now, we will initialize each node using the Baobab genesis file. 1) For CN, $ cd <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data $ kcn --networkid 1001 init --datadir <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data genesis.json 2) For PN, $ cd <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data $ kcn --networkid 1001 init --datadir <your_klaytn_home_path>/kpnd/data genesis.json If you finish this step, please click the next button > on the right side of this page.
